title: Firsthand Interview!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Phew~, I think this is all? Which one would you like to read first, Shioriko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>You brought this much here? It must’ve been heavy.... Thank you very much, Hanayo-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>It’s not heavy at all! It’s my beloved school idols’ magazines, after all♪ Plus, I was so happy and excited that you asked me. So I wanted to show you all of my recommendations♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I’m truly grateful.... With so much around, I’m quite lost on where to begin<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I know! It’s so overwhelming, right! We have pleeenty of time, so let’s find one that piques your interest the most, Shioriko-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Then.... I want to look at magazines that have μ’s in them<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eeeh!? μ’s!? Umm.... This one.... and maybe this one<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>....They’re really worthwhile articles to read. I also felt the same way back on the school idol festival’s stage<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ehehe.... I think μ’s is really amazing, but.... It feels kind of weird hearing that<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I’d like to hear your story while reading these magazines today, Hanayo-san. Please let me ask a lot of questions!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
